ygData.subject: Fliq!!!!!

Brix watched on as the DNA Scanner looked for a suitable organic life 
to make Octociz' new beast mode.

"Scan complete. Match found."

A bright light appeared inside the pod, where Brix had to shield his 
eyes. When it ended, the pod started opening. He was about to see 
what  Octociz looked like. The pod finished opening and.....nothing 
was there.

"Oh My God! The pod musn't of been stable enough. It killed him!!!!"

"Brix over here!"

Brix turned around to see a giant Fox sitting on a tree branch.

"Octociz, is that you?"

"Well, it was me. I am Octociz, put that name doesn't seems right any 
more. Call me Fliq. Fliq the fox!"

"Man, that was fast, you just went right passed me and Ramulus."

"I know. Look at this!"

Fliq started showing off, showing leaping and twirling tricks he 
could do. He found a small tree and started clawing at it. within 5 
seconds it had fallen over.

"Fliq MAXIMIZE!!"

Fliq went to bot mode. He looked superb. All flashy, new metal. He 
checked out his weapons. On one arm his paw peeled back to reveal a 
built in grenade launcher. His other paw grew claws and on the bottom 
part and made a clamping device which can crush anything. Between the 
clamping device, a slit opened up in his paw and out came a chainaw. 
Two Plasma Cannons were mounted on his shoulders. He also had Optic 
lasers. The end of his tail opened to reveal a jet engine.

"Thanks Brix, and Thank You Ramulus. But I think we need to get back 
to base now."

(Yanshosh, I'll be sending you a bio for Fliq soon!)
